title: Designing and Applying ChatGPT-Based Language Teaching Methodologies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A digital teaching competency enhancement program for in-service secondary language teachers

learning_goals: Students can design three or more language learning scenarios using ChatGPT and implement them in a simulated environment.

Within six months, learners apply AI-based action research methodologies (e.g., A/B testing, user behavior analysis) to analyze corporate learner data (three performance metrics, two weeks of learning pattern logs), develop a customized feedback system prototype with over 80% accuracy, and submit a validation report meeting four or more of five internal criteria (two functionality, two usability, one scalability items).
Students can verify communication and critical thinking competencies by achieving over 80% in VR simulation assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
